text: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised.
translation.id.indonesian: dalam keadaan mereka menekurkan pandangannya (serta) diliputi kehinaan. Itulah hari yang dahulunya diancamkan kepada mereka.
